content.rendered: Pierre-Mikael Legris and Pryv participate to the panel discussion ‘Touching Lives with Wearable Technology’ at the Wearable Technology Show in London. 16th March 10.30 on the Wearable Disrupt Mainstage. “Continuous monitoring focuses on the vital signs, sport, training service, identity authentication and detect invasion. Our experts discuss how to detect; ECG, breathing, gait analysis, body temperature, posture and medical health whilst ultimately looking at how bionics and other body medical innovations are helping to revolutionise lives.” Jon us during the day at the Swiss Pavilion.
